page.title: 14FARMING
page.content: TEMPLE HILL FARM WOLVEY HEATH Mr. Chase, who lives at the farm, does not own any land but is in charge of 60 acres.His father,the landlord owns the land.Mr Chase breeds replacements for dairy herds and his crops are barley and wheat straw,which is all good for his animals.Mr Chase ownstwo tractors and also trailers for loading and manaeovring the tractors. He also has a seed mower, hay baler,carting equipment, a drill and an artificial spinner and a ditcher. Mr. Chase sends his milk to the milk marketing board, the beef goes to either the market or slaughter house. He sells some eggs at the door but nothing else.There are three harvests in the year. The first is in spring, the second in early July and the third in Autumn.
